The Taj Mahal (ताजमहल) was built
by Shah Jahan as a memorial for his third

wife, Mumtaz Mahal, who died giving birth
to their 14th child in 1631.

He wrote that the beauty of the structure
made “the sun and the moon shed tears from

their eyes”, and while I may not have shed
a tear, it’s a sight that did not disappoint.
